      • partition

        private int partition​(int[] list,
                      int first,
                      int last)
        Partition the array list[first..last] and increment quick sort swap counter for each element swap in lists
        Parameters:
        list - Non-empty array of integers
        first - Non-negative integer used as index for forward search
        last - Non-negative integer used as index for backward search
        Returns:
        Non-negative integer representing index of next pivot element
